about_the_game:
Get a taste of Lynn and Arne's everyday life between cases!
There's a lot more to Lynn's life in the other world than you see in the main story!
Take the curious events at the Lugenberg Festival...
Unravel a new mystery in this Interlude chapter,
which takes place between Cases 1 and 2.


Lynn is still having trouble adjusting to life in Lugenberg,
especially so soon after the events of "The Reinweiß Murder."
To help cheer her up,
Arne and Zisye decide to take her for a night out on the town, monster style!
What kind of supernatural delights await Lynn at the festival?
And what is the mysterious song that seems to be calling out to her?
